org.jlab.geom

Class Shape3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.geom.Shape3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformable

    public class Shape3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformable
    Geometrical Shape described by Face3D objects. The object can be tested for line intersection.

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(double x,
                   double y,
                   double z)
        Move the shape to a coordinate (x,y,z). The center point of the shape will be moved to given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate for the new center of the shape
        y - y coordinate for the new center of the shape
        z - z coordinate for the new center of the shape

      • toJVXString

        public java.lang.String toJVXString(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a string corresponding to a geometry shape in JVX format.
        Parameters:
        name - name that will appear in XML file
        Returns:
        XML string for the object.
